overview: Three adventurous men leave their wives at home for a weekend of roughing it at a rural cabin in the mountains. When they arrive and discover that the cabin is too dismal for even the most hearty of campers, they hire three lovely ladies from the starving students labor force to help brighten things up. Of course these students are starving, but what for? Gorgeous Nikki Charm , Joanna Storm and Tess Ferre treat our big mountain men to the time of their lives and these girls don't leave until they are well satisfied!
title: Starved for Affection
